wikipedia_page.main: John Edward Tomlinson, Baron Tomlinson (born 1 August 1939), is a British Labour Co-operative politician.  He is currently a life peer in the House of Lords, and was previously a Member of Parliament from 1974 to 1979, and a Member of the European Parliament (MEP) from 1984 to 1999.

link_mentions.page: List of members of the European Parliament (1984–1989)
